response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product holds immense value to us, but I understand its worth may be different for you. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 7500}
